Package org.opensaml.profile.action

Interfaces and classes for profile actions, discrete units of behavior that make up a profile.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MessageEncoderFactory
    A component that returns a MessageEncoder instance based on the content of a profile request context.
    ProfileAction<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
    Interface for actions that operate on a ProfileRequestContext.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractConditionalProfileAction<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
    Base class for conditional profile actions.
    AbstractHandlerDelegatingProfileAction<DelegateType extends MessageHandler>
    Base class for a profile action which just delegates to an instance of MessageHandler.
    AbstractProfileAction<InboundMessageType,OutboundMessageType>
    Base class for profile actions.
    ActionSupport
    Helper class for ProfileAction operations.
    EventIds
    Constants to use for ProfileAction EventContexts.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    EventException
    Runtime exception which may be used to communicate a specific event ID.

Package org.opensaml.profile.action Description

Interfaces and classes for profile actions, discrete units of behavior that make up a profile.
